title: Breaking The Nurse's No-Dating Rule
description: Can he tear down her barriers?Nurse Julia has a life plan—and dreamy Dr Boone Richards isn’t in it. Adamant that history won’t repeat itself, she’s set herself a list of rules. Number one is absolutely no dating! But the rulebook’s soon thrown out of the window by their overwhelming attraction… Discovering her past and Boone’s are tainted with the same brush could bring them even closer. If Julia can open her heart and let him in…
author: Janice Lynn
